quoteText: If any part of this Agreement is determined to be invalid or unenforceable pursuant to applicable law including, but not limited to, the warranty disclaimers and liability limitations set forth above, then the invalid or unenforceable provision will be deemed superseded by a valid, enforceable provision that most closely matches the intent of the original provision and the remaining provisions in this Agreement shall continue in effect.
title: Invalidity of any portion of the Terms of Service does not entail invalidity of its remainder

tosdr.case: Invalidity of any portion of the Terms of Service does not entail invalidity of its remainder
